entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:42 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
